name: Ancestor's Chosen
text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
flavor: Empowered by generations of strength.
title: Ancestor's Chosen

name: Anger
text:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
flavor:
"For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Anger

name: Anurid Barkripper
text: Threshold — Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: When it croaks, so do you.
title: Anurid Barkripper

name: Anurid Brushhopper
text: Discard two cards: Exile Anurid Brushhopper. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: It's so tough it can frighten itself into hiding.
title: Anurid Brushhopper

name: Anurid Swarmsnapper
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor: Anurids have the problem of airborne invaders licked.
title: Anurid Swarmsnapper

name: Arcane Teachings
text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
flavor: Dwarves may teach at the speed of stone, but their results are solid.
title: Arcane Teachings

name: Aven Fogbringer
text:
Flying
When Aven Fogbringer enters the battlefield, return target land to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."
title: Aven Fogbringer

name: Aven Warcraft
text:
Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, choose a color. Creatures you control also gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
title: Aven Warcraft

name: Balthor the Defiled
text:
Minion creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.
title: Balthor the Defiled

name: Barbarian Bully
text: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: "Out of my way!"
title: Barbarian Bully

name: Battle Screech
text:
Put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Battle Screech

name: Battlefield Scrounger
text: Threshold — Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
title: Battlefield Scrounger

name: Battlewise Aven
text:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.
title: Battlewise Aven

name: Benevolent Bodyguard
text: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."
title: Benevolent Bodyguard

name: Book Burning
text: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.
title: Book Burning

name: Border Patrol
text: Vigilance
flavor:
"We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."
—Commander Eesha
title: Border Patrol

name: Brawn
text:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.
flavor:
"‘I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Brawn

name: Breaking Point
text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Enough!"
title: Breaking Point

name: Browbeat
text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept
title: Browbeat

name: Burning Wish
text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.
flavor: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.
title: Burning Wish

name: Cabal Therapy
text:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Cabal Therapy

name: Cabal Trainee
text: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor:
"Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck"
—Cabal instructor
title: Cabal Trainee

name: Cagemail
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.
flavor:
"Power often costs too high a price."
—Commander Eesha
title: Cagemail

name: Canopy Claws
text:
Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Canopy Claws

name: Centaur Rootcaster
text: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
title: Centaur Rootcaster

name: Cephalid Constable
text: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.
flavor: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.
title: Cephalid Constable

name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
text: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.
title: Cephalid Inkshrouder

name: Chastise
text: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
flavor:
"Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."
—Mystic elder
title: Chastise

name: Commander Eesha
text: Flying, protection from creatures
flavor: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."
title: Commander Eesha

name: Crush of Wurms
text:
Put three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Crush of Wurms

name: Cunning Wish
text: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.
flavor: He wished for knowledge, but not for the will to apply it.
title: Cunning Wish

name: Death Wish
text: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.
flavor: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.
title: Death Wish

name: Defy Gravity
text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Magical or not, it's still a cloud.
title: Defy Gravity

name: Dwarven Bloodboiler
text: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: His battle cry unleashes an avalanche of dwarves.
title: Dwarven Bloodboiler

name: Dwarven Driller
text: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to him or her.
flavor:
"Drill the planet, it's no trouble:
Mining granite, making rubble."
—Dwarven drilling song
title: Dwarven Driller

name: Dwarven Scorcher
text: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to him or her.
flavor: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.
title: Dwarven Scorcher

name: Earsplitting Rats
text:
When Earsplitting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.
flavor: Rats come in one amount: too many.
title: Earsplitting Rats

name: Elephant Guide
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature dies, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Nature's strength outlives the strong.
title: Elephant Guide

name: Ember Shot
text:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Draw a card.
flavor: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.
title: Ember Shot

name: Envelop
text: Counter target sorcery spell.
flavor:
"What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."
—Ambassador Laquatus
title: Envelop

name: Epic Struggle
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.
flavor:
"If our foes will not listen to words, perhaps hooves and claws will make them take notice."
—Seton, centaur druid
title: Epic Struggle

name: Erhnam Djinn
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.
flavor: He provides a safe path to nowhere.
title: Erhnam Djinn

name: Exoskeletal Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor:
"We use only what we need—but in times of strife, our need becomes great."
—Centaur warrior
title: Exoskeletal Armor

name: Filth
text:
Swampwalk
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
flavor:
"As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Filth

name: Firecat Blitz
text:
Put X 1/1 red Elemental Cat creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
Flashback—{R}{R}, Sacrifice X Mountains. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Firecat Blitz

name: Flaring Pain
text:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.
Flashback {R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor:
"I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."
—Matoc, lavamancer
title: Flaring Pain

name: Flash of Insight
text:
Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Exile X blue cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost, then exile it. You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)
title: Flash of Insight

name: Fledgling Dragon
text:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Fledgling Dragon gets +3/+3 and has "{R}: Fledgling Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
title: Fledgling Dragon

name: Folk Medicine
text:
You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Sometimes the healers need healing.
title: Folk Medicine

name: Forcemage Advocate
text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: "Our unity renews our strength."
title: Forcemage Advocate

name: Funeral Pyre
text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor:
"Raze the body. Raise the soul."
—Mystic elder
title: Funeral Pyre

name: Genesis
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Genesis

name: Giant Warthog
text: Trample
flavor:
"When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."
—Nomad myth
title: Giant Warthog

name: Glory
text:
Flying
{2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Glory was gone; Glory was everywhere."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Glory

name: Golden Wish
text: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.
flavor: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.
title: Golden Wish

name: Goretusk Firebeast
text: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player.
flavor: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.
title: Goretusk Firebeast

name: Grave Consequences
text:
Each player may exile any number of cards from his or her graveyard. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"You call that a nightmare?"
—Braids, dementia summoner
title: Grave Consequences

name: Grip of Amnesia
text:
Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
—Ambassador Laquatus
title: Grip of Amnesia

name: Grizzly Fate
text:
Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Threshold — Put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Grizzly Fate

name: Guided Strike
text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:
"May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."
—Nomad war prayer
title: Guided Strike

name: Guiltfeeder
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.
title: Guiltfeeder

name: Hapless Researcher
text: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.
title: Hapless Researcher

name: Harvester Druid
text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.
flavor: "In the end, the same soil lies atop the field, within the mountain, and under the sea."
title: Harvester Druid

name: Hunting Grounds
text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Hunting Grounds has "Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield."
flavor: In the heavy hush of Krosa, drawing on mana is like ringing a dinner bell.
title: Hunting Grounds

name: Infectious Rage
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
When enchanted creature dies, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to the battlefield attached to that creature.
title: Infectious Rage

name: Ironshell Beetle
text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor:
"Why waste time creating weapons? Nature provides us with all we need."
—Centaur warrior
title: Ironshell Beetle

name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
text:
First strike, haste
{T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "My brother and I both come from Balthor's forge. Kamahl has a temper of fire. I have a temper of steel."
title: Jeska, Warrior Adept

name: Keep Watch
text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
flavor: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."
title: Keep Watch

name: Krosan Reclamation
text:
Target player shuffles up to two target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Krosan Reclamation

name: Krosan Verge
text:
Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
title: Krosan Verge

name: Krosan Wayfarer
text: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor:
"The Krosan Forest lives, and druids are its seeds."
—Seton, centaur druid
title: Krosan Wayfarer

name: Laquatus's Disdain
text:
Counter target spell cast from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."
title: Laquatus's Disdain

name: Lava Dart
text:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Lava Dart

name: Lead Astray
text: Tap up to two target creatures.
flavor:
"Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."
—Commander Eesha
title: Lead Astray

name: Liberated Dwarf
text: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: Freed from their chains, these dwarves are bound only by honor.
title: Liberated Dwarf

name: Lightning Surge
text:
Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Lightning Surge

name: Living Wish
text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
flavor: He wished for growth, but not for a way to control it.
title: Living Wish

name: Lost in Thought
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Its controller may exile three cards from his or her graveyard for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
title: Lost in Thought

name: Masked Gorgon
text:
Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.
Threshold — Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
title: Masked Gorgon

name: Mental Note
text:
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor: Some minds are more open than others.
title: Mental Note

name: Mirari's Wake
text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.
flavor: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.
title: Mirari's Wake

name: Mirror Wall
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{W}: Mirror Wall can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor:
"Breaking it would be about four hundred years bad luck."
—Nomad sentry
title: Mirror Wall

name: Mist of Stagnation
text:
Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard, then untaps those permanents.
title: Mist of Stagnation

name: Morality Shift
text: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.
title: Morality Shift

name: Nantuko Monastery
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
Threshold — {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
title: Nantuko Monastery

name: Nantuko Tracer
text: When Nantuko Tracer enters the battlefield, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor:
Your past is a map to where you will go.
—Nantuko teaching
title: Nantuko Tracer

name: Nomad Mythmaker
text: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to a creature you control.
flavor: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.
title: Nomad Mythmaker

name: Nullmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "Our unity unmasks your deceit."
title: Nullmage Advocate

name: Phantom Centaur
text:
Protection from black
Phantom Centaur enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Centaur, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Centaur.
title: Phantom Centaur

name: Phantom Flock
text:
Flying
Phantom Flock enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Flock, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Flock.
title: Phantom Flock

name: Phantom Nantuko
text:
Trample
Phantom Nantuko enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nantuko, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nantuko.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phantom Nantuko.
title: Phantom Nantuko

name: Phantom Nishoba
text:
Trample
Phantom Nishoba enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Phantom Nishoba deals damage, you gain that much life.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.
title: Phantom Nishoba

name: Phantom Nomad
text:
Phantom Nomad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.
title: Phantom Nomad

name: Phantom Tiger
text:
Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.
title: Phantom Tiger

name: Planar Chaos
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos.
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell.
title: Planar Chaos

name: Prismatic Strands
text:
Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.
Flashback—Tap an untapped white creature you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Prismatic Strands

name: Pulsemage Advocate
text: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "Our unity revives our hopes."
title: Pulsemage Advocate

name: Quiet Speculation
text: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.
flavor:
"The best foresight is hindsight."
—Empress Llawan
title: Quiet Speculation

name: Rats' Feast
text: Exile X target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor:
"That does it—I quit"
—Cabal grave robber
title: Rats' Feast

name: Ray of Revelation
text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.
title: Ray of Revelation

name: Riftstone Portal
text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."
title: Riftstone Portal

name: Scalpelexis
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of his or her library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.
title: Scalpelexis

name: Seedtime
text:
Cast Seedtime only during your turn.
Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent cast a blue spell this turn.
flavor:
The hippo grows wings to fight the condor.
—Nantuko teaching
title: Seedtime

name: Selfless Exorcist
text: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist.
title: Selfless Exorcist

name: Serene Sunset
text: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.
flavor: The armies paused, silent, as the warriors reflected on the sunsets of their youth.
title: Serene Sunset

name: Shaman's Trance
text: Until end of turn, other players can't play cards from their graveyards, and you may play cards from other players' graveyards as though they were in your graveyard.
title: Shaman's Trance

name: Shieldmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.
flavor: "Our unity conquers all fears."
title: Shieldmage Advocate

name: Silver Seraph
text:
Flying
Threshold — Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.
title: Silver Seraph

name: Solitary Confinement
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
title: Solitary Confinement

name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
text:
Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
title: Soulcatchers' Aerie

name: Soulgorger Orgg
text:
Trample
When Soulgorger Orgg enters the battlefield, you lose all but 1 life.
When Soulgorger Orgg leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it entered the battlefield.
title: Soulgorger Orgg

name: Spellgorger Barbarian
text:
When Spellgorger Barbarian enters the battlefield, discard a card at random.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: The epidemic insanity had a lasting effect on certain barbarians—but no one noticed.
title: Spellgorger Barbarian

name: Spelljack
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may play it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
title: Spelljack

name: Spirit Cairn
text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor: It marks the border between here and hereafter.
title: Spirit Cairn

name: Spurnmage Advocate
text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor: "Our unity humbles our foes."
title: Spurnmage Advocate

name: Stitch Together
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
title: Stitch Together

name: Sudden Strength
text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.
title: Sudden Strength

name: Suntail Hawk
text: Flying
flavor:
"Our forebears once flew like this—carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."
—Commander Eesha
title: Suntail Hawk

name: Sutured Ghoul
text:
Trample
As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.
title: Sutured Ghoul

name: Swelter
text: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
flavor: No circle has a beginning, but many have foreseeable ends.
title: Swelter

name: Swirling Sandstorm
text: Threshold — Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.
title: Swirling Sandstorm

name: Sylvan Safekeeper
text: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor:
"How could someone so small cause so much trouble?"
—Nomad sentry
title: Sylvan Safekeeper

name: Telekinetic Bonds
text: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor:
"Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."
—Ambassador Laquatus
title: Telekinetic Bonds

name: Test of Endurance
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
flavor:
"If we have learned nothing else, we have learned to survive."
—Mystic elder
title: Test of Endurance

name: Thriss, Nantuko Primus
text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor: "When you live for others, you live for yourself."
title: Thriss, Nantuko Primus

name: Toxic Stench
text:
Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
title: Toxic Stench

name: Trained Pronghorn
text: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.
flavor:
"The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."
—Nomad myth
title: Trained Pronghorn

name: Treacherous Vampire
text:
Flying
Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard.
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire dies, you lose 6 life."
title: Treacherous Vampire

name: Treacherous Werewolf
text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf dies, you lose 4 life."
title: Treacherous Werewolf

name: Tunneler Wurm
text: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.
flavor: If an anurid's lucky, it'll find a warm tunnel for bedtime. If a wurm's lucky, it'll find a warm anurid for breakfast.
title: Tunneler Wurm

name: Unquestioned Authority
text:
Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
flavor:
"Only the Ancestor should be revered."
—Mystic heretic
title: Unquestioned Authority

name: Valor
text:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
flavor:
"The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Valor

name: Venomous Vines
text: Destroy target enchanted permanent.
flavor:
"True strength comes from within. The false promise of unnatural power only incurs Krosa's wrath."
—Seton, centaur druid
title: Venomous Vines

name: Vigilant Sentry
text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."
title: Vigilant Sentry

name: Web of Inertia
text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, that player may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.
flavor: Cephalids specialize in lose-lose situations.
title: Web of Inertia

name: Wonder
text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
flavor:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings
title: Wonder

name: Worldgorger Dragon
text:
Flying, trample
When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control.
When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
title: Worldgorger Dragon

name: Wormfang Behemoth
text:
When Wormfang Behemoth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your hand.
When Wormfang Behemoth leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.
title: Wormfang Behemoth

name: Wormfang Crab
text:
Wormfang Crab can't be blocked.
When Wormfang Crab enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a permanent you control other than Wormfang Crab and exiles it.
When Wormfang Crab leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
title: Wormfang Crab

name: Wormfang Drake
text:
Flying
When Wormfang Drake enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake.
When Wormfang Drake leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
title: Wormfang Drake

name: Wormfang Manta
text:
Flying
When Wormfang Manta enters the battlefield, you skip your next turn.
When Wormfang Manta leaves the battlefield, you take an extra turn after this one.
title: Wormfang Manta

name: Wormfang Newt
text:
When Wormfang Newt enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Newt leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.
title: Wormfang Newt

name: Wormfang Turtle
text:
When Wormfang Turtle enters the battlefield, exile a land you control.
When Wormfang Turtle leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
